name: part_015
file: tmp_【#湊あくあ卒業ライブ】あくあ色に染まれ！／MinatoAqua Graduation LIVE [fDtUy1PTor0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_015.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua performs the song 'Aqua-iro Palette' while riding a giant cat-shaped float in a virtual stadium.
Aqua gets emotional and addresses the audience between song segments.
Aqua continues her performance on a grand stage with a castle backdrop.
MC segment during the song, where Aqua expresses her heartfelt gratitude.
Instrumental dance break during the performance.
Final stretch of the song performance on stage.
Final heartfelt message and expressions of gratitude to fans, members, and staff.
Post-live montage with the graduation live logo.

subtitles.original: 描く夢の未来へ続く
subtitles.english: Continuing on the path to the future I envision

subtitles.original: 道をキミと歩けますように
subtitles.english: I hope I can walk it with you

subtitles.original: ねえもっと 好きになって もらいたいの
subtitles.english: Hey, I want you to like me even more

subtitles.original: 頭の中は君ばっかってゆーか
subtitles.english: My head is full of nothing but you

subtitles.original: そっぽなんて向いてないで
subtitles.english: Don't look away from me

subtitles.original: あーもう ヤキモキしちゃうわ あーあ
subtitles.english: Oh, geez, you're making me so anxious, ah-ah

subtitles.original: ずっとずっと 好きがいいの
subtitles.english: I want us to like each other forever

subtitles.original: 心の奥までトキメイちゃうくらいに
subtitles.english: So much that my heart throbs to its core

subtitles.original: こっち向いててよね ダーリン？
subtitles.english: Keep looking this way, okay, darling?

subtitles.original: あーもう 離さないから 絶対に 絶対ね
subtitles.english: Oh, geez, I'll never let you go, never ever

subtitles.original: あはは、もうボロボロだよ...
subtitles.english: Ahaha, I'm already a mess...

subtitles.original: みんなありがとう...
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone...

subtitles.original: あ、やばい、ひどい顔してない？ 大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Oh no, do I look terrible? Am I okay?

subtitles.original: キミがいるから私
subtitles.english: Because you're here,

subtitles.original: いつでも頑張れるんだ
subtitles.english: I can always do my best

subtitles.original: 落ち込んで悲しくたって
subtitles.english: Even when I'm feeling down and sad

subtitles.original: キミがいるから...
subtitles.english: Because you're here...

subtitles.original: 今日が本当に最高の日になりました！
subtitles.english: Today has become a truly wonderful day!

subtitles.original: この景色を見せてくれて、本当に本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you so, so much for showing me this view!

subtitles.original: 世界中、あくあ色に染まれー！
subtitles.english: Whole world, be dyed in Aqua's color!

subtitles.original: キミがいるから歩いてこれた
subtitles.english: I was able to keep walking because you were here

subtitles.original: キミがいなくちゃ前も見れない
subtitles.english: I can't even look ahead without you

subtitles.original: 嫌なこととか辛いこととかあったって
subtitles.english: Even if there were bad things or painful things

subtitles.original: キミの力でここまで笑ってこれたんだ
subtitles.english: I was able to smile until now because of your strength

subtitles.original: 今度はもっと私がグッと引っ張って
subtitles.english: This time, I'll pull you along much harder

subtitles.original: 連れて行くんだ
subtitles.english: And take you with me

subtitles.original: キミがいるから私がいるの
subtitles.english: I exist because you are here

subtitles.original: キミがいるから私がいるの
subtitles.english: I exist because you are here

subtitles.original: そんな私を愛してくれる？
subtitles.english: Will you love me as I am?

subtitles.original: ねえもっと ねえもっと
subtitles.english: Hey, more, hey, more

subtitles.original: まだもっと 受け止めてよね！
subtitles.english: Still more, please accept me!

subtitles.original: ねえいい？
subtitles.english: Is that okay?

subtitles.original: さあ声を上げて！
subtitles.english: Now, raise your voices!

subtitles.original: ねえもっと ねえもっと
subtitles.english: Hey, more, hey, more

subtitles.original: 好きになってもらいたいの
subtitles.english: I want you to like me even more

subtitles.original: わたしばかりみたいに
subtitles.english: Like you're only looking at me

subtitles.original: そっぽなんて向かせないわ
subtitles.english: I won't let you look away

subtitles.original: ねえほら 夢中にしちゃうわ あーあ
subtitles.english: Hey, look, I'll make you crazy for me, ah-ah

subtitles.original: ずっとずっと 好きがいいの
subtitles.english: I want us to like each other forever

subtitles.original: 心も体も染まっちゃうくらいに
subtitles.english: So much that our hearts and bodies are dyed

subtitles.original: こっち向いててよね ダーリン？
subtitles.english: Keep looking this way, okay, darling?

subtitles.original: あーもう 離さないから 絶対に
subtitles.english: Oh, geez, I'll never let you go, never

subtitles.original: 絶対ね 絶対よ
subtitles.english: Never ever, for sure

subtitles.original: 約束だよ！
subtitles.english: It's a promise!

subtitles.original: love you, love you...
subtitles.english: love you, love you...

subtitles.original: ここまで応援してくれたファンのみんな、
subtitles.english: To all the fans who have supported me this far,

subtitles.original: 仲良くしてくれたホロメン、
subtitles.english: To the Hololive members who were so kind to me,

subtitles.original: 支えてくれたスタッフの皆さん、本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: To all the staff who supported me, thank you so much!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ最高！
subtitles.english: Hololive is the best!

subtitles.original: 愛しちゃう、もっと。
subtitles.english: I'll love you more.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!
